headline: 3 Reasons L3 Harris and Other Defense Stocks Are Taking a Hit
summary: Defense stocks have been running hot, but rallies don’t come without interruptions—and Wednesday counts as a big interruption for the likes of L3Harris Technologies,  Lockheed Martin  and Northrop Grumman.  Shares of defense contractors were being hit hard, even without decisively negative news.  A combination of profit-taking catalyzed by an investor day at L3Harris Technologies, moves back into software stocks, and President Donald Trump’s State of the Union speech may be responsible.

headline: Lawmakers From Both Parties Push Navy to Award Mega Submarine Contracts
summary: They say that waiting any longer for the deals for at least 15 submarines could harm the manufacturing base the Navy relies on.

raw.headline: Lawmakers From Both Parties Push Navy to Award Mega Submarine Contracts

headline: The CIA urges Iranians to reach out as informants in rare move
summary: The CIA invited Iranians with  "sensitive information" or "unique skills" to contact it.

headline: Sean Duffy Hails Trump's 'Art Of The Deal' As Canada Certifies All Gulfstream Jets
summary: Sean Duffy has hailed Trump as Transport Canada certifies all General Dynamics Corp-backed Gulfstream jets.

raw.headline: Sean Duffy Hails Trump's 'Art Of The Deal' As Canada Certifies All Gulfstream Jets
